name: MCT_Unregister_Facility
title: MCT $unregister-facility operation
description: This operation is used to unregister a facility defined as a FHIR Location or Organization resource. If the facility does not exist this operation will result in an error.

parameter.name: facilityId
parameter.documentation: The reference to the [Location](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/location.html) or [Organization](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/organization.html) resource to be unregistered.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: This operation returns an [OperationOutcome](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/operationoutcome.html) resource detailing either the success or error(s) in the `issue.diagnostic` element.
